name: 🛠️ Scheduled database maintenance [⚠️ DOWNTIME REQUIRED]
content:
We will be performing critical database maintenance that will affect our services.

📅 Timeline:
- Pre-maintenance restrictions begin: January 26, 2025 08:45 UTC
- Full maintenance window begins: January 26, 2025 09:00 UTC
- Expected duration: 45 minutes

🚫 Impact:
During the maintenance window:
- Content Management API will be completely unavailable
- Content Delivery API will be completely unavailable
- Admin interface will be completely unavailable

✅ Services that will continue working:
- CDN-cached GraphQL requests
- Asset URLs

⚠️ Starting at 08:45 UTC, the following operations will return 403 errors:
- Creating sandbox environments
- Destroying sandbox environments
- Project duplication
- Project deletion

We recommend scheduling any critical content updates or administrative tasks outside this maintenance window.

We'll update this post once during the maintenance. Thank you for your patience.
